description: Pull on Övik Shirt and head down to your favourite café to plan your weekend adventures. Comfort fit and cool, fast-drying fabric make it a favourite on warm days, and its relaxed style feels just as right in the forest as it does at a summer barbeque. Cool fabric that wicks away moisture. 65% recycled polyester, 35% organic cotton. Button-down collar. Comfort fit. Short sleeves. Buttons made from recycled polyester. Comfortably cool in hot temperatures.
name: Fjallraven Ovik SS Shirt - Mens
